name: Shing
description:
~ Shing-Shing! ~

—–—–—–—–—–—–—–—–—–

All made by Rein :>

Made for MiniJam 107!

Controls —–—–—–—–—–—–—–—–—

[R] to restart

[<-] and [->] / [A] and [D] to move

[Z] / [J] to jump

[X] / [K] to attack

Instructions —–—–—–—–—–—–—–—–—–

Combo enemies to freeze them midair and launch them into the ground!

How to kill enemies: 

Hit 3 attacks in succession to launch the enemy in the air and freeze their gravity.

Once the enemy is suspended in the air, jump on them to launch them into the ground.

How to increase your score: 

Jumping on multiple enemies without touching the ground will increase your score combo. (Max combo is 5, and you will keep it for as long as you keep bouncing.)

Attacks and kills will earn you points. You get 5 points for each hit (does stack), and 100 points for each kill. (Multiplied by your score combo, 1000 points for each kill with a 5 combo)

share your scores in the comments :>
